author: Esmay Rosalyne
description:
Chance Dillon kicks off his brand-new dark epic fantasy series with Mercy: Tears of the Fallen, and it would honestly be the understatement of the century to say that this is one of the most dangerously ambitious and boldly imaginative debuts I have ever read. Come for the rich world building, wicked rune magic and […]

title: REVIEW: Mercy: Tears of the Fallen by Chance Dillon
